document_data.name: Kathkote Dawntard
document_data.mainbody: '''Kathkote Dawntard''' was a nobleman in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He sounded sarcastic even in the best of times.
document_data.Personality: He appeared to have a reputation for rage,{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|217-221|21}} Nonetheless, he was smart, patient and scheming.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|237-240|23}}
document_data.Relationships:
He was the son of the elder Dawntard. His usual companions were [[Broryn Windstag]] and [[Delasko Sornstern]]. He was also a co-conspirator with [[Marlin Stormserpent]]'s schemes, though Marlin thought he likely meant trouble.

Marlin's co-conspirators, including Dawntard, included largely families that had been ennobled recently, after the exiling of the [[Bleth]] house and the dispossession of the [[Cormaeril]] family.
document_data.Activities: He frequented [[the Bold Blazon]].{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|317|33}}
